ctx: intros p q r H1 H2 H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce eqP to an evaluable reference.

original: intros p q r H1 H2 H3 H4. unfold eqP. intros H5 H6 H7 H8. unfold canonical in *. rewrite H5 in *. rewrite H6 in *. rewrite H7 in *. rewrite H8 in *. unfold pluspf. unfold projsig1. unfold plusP. rewrite H1. reflexivity.
